subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Seven years after being struck in the back of the head by a 92-mile-per-hour fastball, Adam Greenberg got a second plate appearance in the majors, this time with the Marlins.
snippet: Seven years after being struck in the back of the head by a 92-mile-per-hour fastball, Adam Greenberg got a second plate appearance in the majors, this time with the Marlins.
